channel.title: Importing files into VirtualBox Whonix?
channel.description: Not sure if this is the right forum to ask, but is there anyway to import files (such as word documents and pdfs) into a Whonix workstation that's running in a virtual machine? I have the drag and drop (host to guest) enabled but any time I try to use it I get a folder called "Virtualbox Dropped Files" in the Documents folder, but none of the files I dragged and dropped.

item.title: Importing files into VirtualBox Whonix?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:

item.title: Importing files into VirtualBox Whonix?
item.dc:creator: DopyDinosaur
item.description:
Not sure if this is the right forum to ask, but is there anyway to import files (such as word documents and pdfs) into a Whonix workstation that’s running in a virtual machine? I have the drag and drop (host to guest) enabled but any time I try to use it I get a folder called “Virtualbox Dropped Files” in the Documents folder, but none of the files I dragged and dropped.

Read full topic
